title: Global pineapple production by leading countries 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Production in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Production in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
The difference of Production in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 2517.76.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Production in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
Country Costa Rica has the highest Production in thousand metric tons and Colombia has the lowest Production in thousand metric tons.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Production in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Production in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
The difference of Production in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 2517.76.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Production in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Production in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
Second maximum Production in thousand metric tons is found at Country Philippines.
The lowest value at Country Colombia is 3.8x times less than the highest value at Costa Rica.
The Country Costa Rica has the highest Production in thousand metric tons, followed by Philippines, and Brazil. Down to the Country Colombia which is the lowest.
The highest value 3418.16 at Costa Rica is almost 1.75 times larger than the average value 1956.25.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 19562.49.
